content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ home services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today? May I please have your name to get started?
Get rich quick with this amazing opportunity! Call me back ASAP!
It seems this message might not be related to our services. To maintain quality communication, I am marking this contact as spam. If this is a mistake, please reply with a service request.
reason: Detected spam content in customer messages
